name: The Piano Player
description:
You hear a piano in the middle of the night, but you can't find the source. Is this a dream? Or...

Above all else, remember...
You know what you did.
You're awful.

An insecure musician meets a girl with a strange name. His life is never the same.

A soundtrack featuring only Classical Piano Pieces.

This is my first attempt at an RPG Maker game, so I hope you enjoy it! You should be able to beat it in less than 20 minutes.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

If you're wondering which file to download:

One of these files includes the RTP (Run Time Package) for RPG Maker VX Ace.

If you don't own RPG Maker VX Ace, you'll want that one.

If you already have RPG Maker VX Ace installed, then go ahead and download without the RTP for a faster download!

More details on RPG Maker Run Time Packages can be found here:

http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages
